sentences.sContent: At the time, Arnold had disapproved of such levity.
sentences.sCn: 那时候，阿诺德不赞成如此的轻浮行为。

remMethod.val: lev (升起) + ity → 轻浮的人总是易变的， 像是升起的烟一样 → 轻浮

words.tran: 使轻轻浮起；使飘浮空中

trans.tranCn: 轻率； 轻浮； 变化无常
trans.tranOther: lack of respect or seriousness when you are dealing with something serious
